entities.name: Harry
entities.description: Main character of the story, expecting to see Mad-Eye's ghost and feeling guilty about not being able to do anything about Horcruxes yet.

entities.name: Mad-Eye
entities.description: A member of the Order who has died, with a ghost that Harry expects to see.

entities.name: Horcruxes
entities.description: Objects created by Voldemort to house pieces of his soul, which Harry needs to find and destroy.

entities.name: Ron

entities.name: Hermione
entities.description: Harry's friend who has been doing research on Horcruxes and will share her findings with Harry when he is ready.
